Recommendations: (1) reduce work hours, (2) increase sleep 1 hour, (3) add daily sauna, (4) book therapy session.' Prevent before crisis.

4_blockchain_governance.membership_nfts: Each member tier = unique NFT (ERC-721 standard, Ethereum OR Polygon chain ‚Äî lower fees). NFT contains: membership level (founding/corporate/individual), access rights (weeks/year, facilities, governance votes), transferability (founding = yes tradeable?, individual = non-transferable tied to person), inheritance (can bequeath to children?). Smart contract enforces rules automatically (e.g., corporate NFT ‚Üí max 20 executives tagged, swap names but company retains slot).
4_blockchain_governance.transparent_finances: All ecosystem revenue/expenses on-chain (public ledger, quarterly reports, annual audits external). Why: trust-building (members see money flows, no hidden fraud), accountability (cannot cook books), mission-alignment proof (scholarship spending, research funding visible ‚Äî not just profit extraction).
4_blockchain_governance.research_provenance: Datasets timestamped on blockchain (SHA-256 hash recorded, immutable record), prevents: data manipulation post-hoc (p-hacking, HARKing), ensures: reproducibility (exact dataset version used known), intellectual property (who published what when, priority disputes resolved).
4_blockchain_governance.voting_governance: Major decisions (e.g., 'Should we build fifth campus –≤ Siberia?') ‚Üí token holders vote (founding members 5 votes each, corporate 3 votes, individual 1 vote ‚Äî weighted). Smart contracts tally, execute –µ—Å–ª–∏ supermajority (e.g., 70% threshold). Transparent, tamper-proof, member sovereignty.

5_security_privacy.encryption: Data at rest: AES-256 (military-grade, quantum-resistant coming ‚Äî lattice-based algorithms ready). Data in transit: TLS 1.3 (forward secrecy, no downgrade attacks). Keys managed: HSM (hardware security modules ‚Äî Thales, AWS CloudHSM), multi-sig (require 3/5 key-holders to decrypt critical data ‚Äî no single point compromise).
5_security_privacy.access_control: Role-based (RBAC ‚Äî researchers access research data only, accountants finances only, no omniscient admin). Multi-factor authentication (MFA ‚Äî password + biometric + hardware token). Biometric where needed (fingerprint/face –¥–ª—è server room entry, critical systems).
5_security_privacy.anonymization: Research data de-identified (HIPAA Safe Harbor method ‚Äî remove 18 identifiers, dates shifted, rare diseases aggregated). Re-identification risk assessed (k-anonymity, differential privacy techniques), external audit (privacy experts review before publication).
5_security_privacy.sovereignty: No cloud dependence (AWS, Azure, Google = foreign jurisdiction, data sovereignty lost, surveillance backdoors possible). All on-premise OR federated trusted partners (Swiss data centers, privacy-respecting). Russian law compliance (personal data localization –µ—Å–ª–∏ mandated, –Ω–æ: encrypted ‚Üí government cannot access even if servers seized).
5_security_privacy.cyber_defense: SOC (Security Operations Center ‚Äî 24/7 monitoring, intrusion detection IDS/IPS, SIEM log analysis), penetration testing (quarterly ‚Äî hire white-hat hackers, find vulnerabilities before black-hats), bug bounties (reward external researchers who find flaws, Hn HackerOne platform), incident response (playbook ‚Äî breach detected ‚Üí isolate, forensics, notify, patch, disclose transparently).
